PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Condition_Time_Oper: Compare operator for the time. Will be loaded using the compare operators.
Start of the content that will only be rendered if the operator is 'before'. Must be closed using Tale_Condition_Time_Operator_Is_Before_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the operator is 'before'.
Start of the content that will only be rendered if the operator is 'after'. Must be closed using Tale_Condition_Time_Operator_Is_After_End.
End of the content that will only be rendered if the operator is 'after'.
PlaceholderDesc_Tale_Condition_Time_Tota: Total minutes for the comparison. Will be calculated as Hours * MinutesPerHour + Minutes.
